Если бы Габен убивал читеров, была бы крутая игра, а так керота полнейшая. Фейсит спасает. С обновлением привнесли скины, которые торчат изза укрытий больше, чем стандартные, а также скины невидимки, чтобы внести больший дисбаланс.
我真的不喜欢这个游戏，但是我来自美国的同性恋朋友总是让我和他们一起玩，我讨厌这些黑鬼
this game is amazing i mean absolutely extraordinary

está lleno de hackers awa de uwu

Get ready, get set, CSGO to a magic place in this non-stop thrill ride.   FPS in casual and other game modes.  Most followed game mode is 5v5 competitive, search and destroy style.  This game is 20 years old and will never die. Teach your kids, they will teach their kids... and their kids may get Half-Life 3.
U can make Paw-Paw on enemies! Good Game!
One of the best games ive ever played. Cant be beat in its originality or competitiveness.
I've played this game forever. I can confirm it's a fun game, and can be very intense! From learning maps, to learning spray pattern. Meet new people. and making new friends! Good Luck & Have Fun!
